com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector

Interface LanguageDetectorProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLanguageDetectorProcessor

    public interface LanguageDetectorProcessor
extends java.io.Closeable
    Any class that can process results found by a language detector.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
